question.xref: DES s6, HC r208, HC r238, KYTS p56
question.text: Yellow zigzag lines on the road outside schools mean

explanation.text: Where there are yellow zigzag markings, you should not park, wait or stop, even to pick up or drop off children. A vehicle parked on the zigzag lines would obstruct children's view of the road and other drivers view of the pavement. Where there is an upright sign there is mandatory prohibition of stopping during the times shown.

answer.text: sound your horn to alert other road users
stop to allow children to cross
you should not park or stop on these lines
you must not drive over these lines
